alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Hendry and west central Palm Beach Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud 9 miles northwest of Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, or 16 miles south of Montura, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Big Cypress Seminole Reservation. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.
